price: Imana Allah, Ihana uwo Ishatse mu biremwa, Ikamuhanira ivyo yakoze kw’isi; Ikanagirira impuhwe uwo Ishatse mu bigaye bakemera, bakanakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe. Bantu! Ni no kuri Yo rero muzosubizwa mumaze gupfa, kugira muharurirwe, muhemberwe n'ivyo mwakoze;
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
